p.e: WELCOME TO THE LASER TAG PROTOTYPE!

EQUIP THE RED OR BLUE BODY AND HEAD PROVIDED,
THE BODY CAN TAKE 4 HITS, AND THE HEAD CAN TAKE 2.

TAKE A GUN, OR TWO IF YOU FEEL LIKE IT, OF THE SAME COLOR
AS YOUR TEAM COLOR, RED OR BLUE.

I WOULD SUGGEST EQUIPPING THE PROVIDED ARM ATTACHMENTS,
WHICH CREATE TEMPORARY SHEILDS.

SHOOTING A PICKUP BOX, SHOWN ON THE RIGHT, WITH YOUR TEAM COLOR
GUN WILL SPAWN THE DISPLAYED ITEM IN YOUR TEAM COLOR.
IF YOU DROP ALL OF YOUR GUNS, REPLACEMENTS CAN BE FOUND IN
THE CENTER OF THE MAP.

IF YOU NEED TO RETURN TO THE SPAWN AREA THERE IS A GREEN PORTAL
ON THE BRIDGE CLOSEST TO SPAWN. HAVE FUN!
